brief_summary.textblock:
Methods Patients received OM-174 twice weekly for a total of 5, 10 or 15 injections of
      either 600, 800 or 1000 µg/m². Pharmacokinetic analysis and cytokine dosages were performed.
      Natural Killer cells activity and toll-like receptors 4 polymorphism analysis were also
      performed.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of OM-174 in Adult Patients With Solid Tumors

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patient with a histologically proven solid tumor, refractory to conventional
             treatment or for which no such treatment existed.

          -  At least one month since the last chemotherapy

          -  Life expectancy above 3 months

          -  Written informed consent

          -  Age above 18

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patient's refusal

          -  Infection

          -  Brain metastasis

          -  Autoimmune disease

          -  Regular use of steroids

          -  Patient included in another protocol

          -  Chemotherapy or radiotherapy less than 6 weeks ago

          -  Immunotherapy less than 8 weeks ago

clinical_study.official_title: Phase One Study With Direct Individual Benefit: Effects of OM-174 in Adult Patients With Solid Tumors.

oversight_info.authority: France: Afssaps - Agence française de sécurité sanitaire des produits de santé (Saint-Denis)

primary_outcome.measure: The occurrence of any adverse event

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety Study, Masking: Open Label
